tns:patch.author: Wessi
tns:patch.description: recreate view at every server startup

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_audit_logger_cleanup AS SELECT value_id AS id, value_shown AS value FROM util_global_settings_possible_ WHERE setting_name = 'Automatic Audit Logger Cleanup';
